name: Mini Ninja Ghost
description:
It's going to be fun all day! It's time to run and jump without stopping, dodging each enemy, 60+ levels are waiting to be completed, don't let any of them get you down!. No more boredom in the waiting line, help our little ghost friend get to his destination! You don't need to be connected to the internet to have fun all day.

Cute and fun graphics.

Charismatic characters.

Difficult levels to have fun all day, they are waiting for you, Download it now and let the fun begin!
